license.name: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International

items.name: CheckCudaVersion
items.description: This repository contains a Python script to check the installed CUDA version using PyTorch. It helps ensure compatibility with machine learning frameworks that require GPU acceleration.

items.name: hand-landmark
items.description: Hand Landmark is a system for recognizing and tracking key points on the hand using MediaPipe technology, a machine learning and computer vision framework from Google.

items.name: Myntra
items.description: This is my Second Commit I have made an applications The Clothes Recommendation System utilizes TensorFlow for powerful machine learning algorithms and Flask for an application framework to deliver personalized clothing suggestions.

items.name: Flood-prediction-model-lstm-
items.description: A Flood prediction model for UP and Assam using Machine learning and the Gradio framework

items.name: HD-IDHV
items.description: Framework to run machine learning datasets with a Hyperdimensional Computing model using the original encoding with C++ and Eigen Library

items.name: CardioGenAI
items.description: CardioGenAI: A Machine Learning-Based Framework for Re-Engineering Drugs for Reduced hERG Liability

items.name: -Generative-Adversarial-Networks-GANs-for-Image-Generation
items.description: This project demonstrates how to implement Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) using the MNIST dataset. GANs are a class of machine learning frameworks designed by Ian Goodfellow and his colleagues in 2014. The goal is to generate new data samples that resemble the training data.

items.name: anacostia-pipeline
items.description: Anacostia is a framework for creating machine learning operations (MLOps) pipelines

items.name: ILISI-SMART-HOME-SMA
items.description: This project implements a Smart Multi-Agent System using the JADE framework to manage a smart home environment. It features multiple agents representing various IoT devices that communicate and coordinate to optimize home automation. Machine learning models are integrated for decision-making to enhance service quality and resource efficiency.

items.name: mlgrid-services
items.description: A framework to serve various generative AIs and other machine learning functions via WebSocket and JSONRPC.

items.name: MMG
items.description: A Machine Learning Framework for Grading Glaucoma Severity for the Tiered Healthcare System in China

items.name: ML-NSGA-PSA-carbon-capture
items.description: This repository contains the scripts to the article *Multi-Scale Computational Design of Metal-Organic Frameworks for Carbon Capture Using Machine Learning and Multi-Objective Optimization* by Zijun Deng and Lev Sarkisov.

items.name: GAN_Project
items.description: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) are machine learning frameworks where a generator creates synthetic data and a discriminator evaluates it, producing high-quality, realistic outputs. They are valuable for applications like image generation and data augmentation, especially when real-world data is hard to collect or expensive.

items.name: Explainable-AI-Interpretable-AI
items.description: Some tools and frameworks for interpret predictions of the machine learning models

items.name: DeepAIKit
items.description: DeepAIKit is an open-source library developed entirely from scratch to provide comprehensive tools for machine learning and deep learning. Without relying on existing frameworks like scikit-learn, PyTorch, or TensorFlow, DeepAIKit simplifies the development, training, and deployment of ML and DL models.

items.name: ARTIST
items.description: A differentiable ray tracer using the PyTorch machine-learning framework in Python.

items.name: dgbpy
items.description: dgbpy is a framework for research and deployment of machine learning models from seismic and well data.

items.name: stock_price_prediction
items.description: Stock price prediction project developed using Flask framework and Machine Learning for predictions.

items.name: Machine-Learning-of-LNPs
items.description: Machine Learning Framework to predict activity and cell viability of LNPs for gene delivery

items.name: ML_Projects
items.description: This repository contains various Machine Learning Projects built using different frameworks and libraries.

items.name: resume_classifier
items.description: his project uses the FastAPI framework to create an API that classifies resumes into job areas and seniority levels. The classification is performed using machine learning models trained with XGBoost and TF-IDF vectorization.

items.name: DeepGNN
items.description: DeepGNN is a framework for training machine learning models on large scale graph data.

items.name: nexuscore-smart-city-platform
items.description: NexusCore is a comprehensive, AI-powered platform that integrates IoT devices, blockchain technology, and machine learning to create a hybrid, cyber-physical system for smart cities. This project would involve developing a robust IoT framework, AI-driven analytics, and a decentralized, blockchain-based data management system.

items.name: MACLAS
items.description: MACLAS stands for Mineral Archaeological CLASsification. A machine-learning based framework for mineral classification of personal adornment objects. It is a complementary material to the paper "A supervised multiclass framework for mineral classification of Iberian beads".

items.name: Flask_Project_based_learning-Flight-Price-Prediction
items.description: This repository contains the end to end learning series of flask framework with working codes and an end to end deployed Machine Learning model.

items.name: raredecay
items.description: Machine Learning based Analysis Framework for physics on top of REP

items.name: DoubleLingo
items.description: Theoretically consistent estimation of causal effects using LLM-based nuisance models by incorporating them within the framework of Double Machine Learning.

items.name: linfa
items.description: A Rust machine learning framework.

items.name: BreastCancer_ML
items.description: Interactive machine-learning web application using the Streamlit framework for Breast Cancer. I used the Breast Cancer Wisconsin (Diagnostic) Data Set for my project.

items.name: Flusk_Basic
items.description: "Flusk_Basic" is featuring a to Flask, a Python web framework. It may include basic or tutorials covering Flask fundamentals for Machine Learning.

items.name: pestpatrol-machine-learning
items.description: PestPatrol model using CNN method and Tensorflow framework

items.name: Essential-Python-Frameworks
items.description: This repository contains comprehensive notes on essential Python frameworks used in data analysis and machine learning.

items.name: jams-rs
items.description: Rust based model serving solution for popular machine learning frameworks

items.name: ml-citation-screening
items.description: A simple machine learning framework for citation screening

items.name: Automating-frequentist-NMA-with-ML
items.description: Automating frequentist network meta-analysis using machine learning. This project streamlines the NMA process by incorporating data preprocessing, model selection, hyperparameter tuning, and evaluation. The goal is to provide a reusable framework for comparing multiple interventions.

items.name: CardioLab
items.description: This is the official repository for CardioLab. A machine and deep learning framework for the estimation and monitoring of laboratory values throught ECG data.

items.name: surv_ai
items.description: A framework to empower forecasting using Large Language Models (LLMs)

items.name: torch_alchemical
items.description: Atomistic machine learning library for training interatomic potentials within PyTorch and PyTorch Geometric frameworks

items.name: Pytorch-Projects
items.description: Welcome to the PyTorch Projects Repository! This repository showcases a collection of projects that demonstrate my skills in using the PyTorch deep learning framework to build machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) models.
